item.title: Docker File Permissions on Windows
item.description: Recently I’ve found something very strange about Linux file permissions when the Docker images are built on Windows hosts.1 Therefore, I’ve conducted a suite of test cases to investigate whether file permissions are preserved with Docker & Skaffold toolchains. All experiment materials are available in the container-chmod repo. Experiment setting The experiment is composed of a few files with typical Unix-style file permissions: . ├── skaffold.yaml └─
